message: Starting test implementation phase. Reading design documents and existing test patterns.

Read all design documents and existing test patterns. Schema defines asymmetric truncation (150 chars user, 8KB assistant), validation specifies 5 critical checks + 7 warnings, existing tests use .fn() syntax for MCP tool calls. Starting test implementation.
Created test_conversation_history.py with 8 comprehensive test cases. Running tests to verify implementation.
Regression testing complete - all 5 existing tests pass with no failures. New test suite ready for Phase 2. Creating final documentation.

Testing implementation COMPLETE. Created test_conversation_history.py with 8 comprehensive test cases (465 lines). ALL 8 tests pass. ALL 5 existing regression tests pass. Zero breaking changes. Documentation complete in TESTING_IMPLEMENTATION_COMPLETE.md
